messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling and the housemates...
messages.msgSnippet: hi, maybe you can check out some unschooling books (e.g. the unschooling handbook or the homeschool book of answers ) and leave them around so you housemates
messages.messageBody:
hi,

maybe you can check out some unschooling books (e.g. the unschooling handbook or the homeschool book of answers ) and leave them around so you housemates can read about unschooling.

just a thought,
susan
austin,tx
'unity through diversity'
 

androdite@... wrote:

.Now my housemates
wanna know why I don't have the boys do the workbooks when I am home so that
I am 'teaching' (and I use that term loosely)...

I don't think my housemates really get the concept of trusting the boys to
learn what they need to learn when they need to learn it..

Anyways...it off to bed for me...tomarrow is library day...

Lhiza
